projects.title: Web Aide Jeune
projects.description: Web Aide Jeune is an association that helps young people overcome their difficulties. I provide technical support to this association to ensure that their website and internal services are always operational..

projects.title: Managing my personal servers
projects.description: For some time now, I've been managing my personal servers entirely, hosting my various services (Git for example).

projects.title: HexConverter
projects.description: A simple application to convert hexadecimal numbers to decimal numbers. Also, it can convert from any base to any base.
